TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ProgressChangedEventHandler(object sender, ProgressChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ProgressChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ProgressChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ProgressChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void ProgressChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ProgressChangedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表將處理 類別的 事件之方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立委派，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify a method to handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#7)]
